mapper.select: select ID, CREATED_TIME, CREATOR, CREATOR_ID, LAST_UPDATE_ID, LAST_UPDATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATER, USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PHONE, SPEND_POINT, AUDIT_STATE, AUDIT_CONTENT, BANK_ID, BANK_NAME, BANK_IMG, CARD_ID, CARD_NAME, ITEM_TYPE, ITEM_CONTENT, GET_MONEY, UNIT_PRICE, SERVICE_ID, SERVICE_NAME, SERVICE_NUMBER, SERVICE_IMG, ODER_DETAIL, WX_PAYMENT_ID, WX_PAYMENT_AMOUNT, DELETED, ORDER_TYPE, SPARE2, SPARE3, SPARE4, SPARE5 from points_alliance.order_form where ID = #{id}
mapper.update:
update points_alliance.order_form
CREATED_TIME = #{createdTime},
CREATOR = #{creator},
CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId},
LAST_UPDATE_ID = #{lastUpdateId},
LAST_UPDATE_TIME = #{lastUpdateTime},
LAST_UPDATER = #{lastUpdater},
USER_ID = #{userId},
USER_NAME = #{userName},
USER_PHONE = #{userPhone},
SPEND_POINT = #{spendPoint},
AUDIT_STATE = #{auditState},
AUDIT_CONTENT = #{auditContent},
BANK_ID = #{bankId},
BANK_NAME = #{bankName},
BANK_IMG = #{bankImg},
CARD_ID = #{cardId},
CARD_NAME = #{cardName},
ITEM_TYPE = #{itemType},
ITEM_CONTENT = #{itemContent},
GET_MONEY = #{getMoney},
UNIT_PRICE = #{unitPrice},
SERVICE_ID = #{serviceId},
SERVICE_NAME = #{serviceName},
SERVICE_NUMBER = #{serviceNumber},
SERVICE_IMG = #{serviceImg},
ODER_DETAIL = #{oderDetail},
WX_PAYMENT_ID = #{wxPaymentId},
WX_PAYMENT_AMOUNT = #{wxPaymentAmount},
DELETED = #{deleted},
ORDER_TYPE = #{orderType},
SPARE2 = #{spare2},
SPARE3 = #{spare3},
SPARE4 = #{spare4},
SPARE5 = #{spare5},
where ID = #{id}
mapper.delete:
update points_alliance.order_form set DELETED = 1, LAST_UPDATE_ID = #{updateId}, LAST_UPDATER = #{updater}, LAST_UPDATE_TIME = #{dateTime} where ID in
#{id}
